text: Council of Hosts - Connoisseurs of Samrpadaya Music conferred the title ‘Thyaga Brahma Baktha Ratna Award’ on Vaidyanatha Krishnan (third right) and the same is being presented by M. Krishnan (second right) and lawyer N.V. Nagasubramanian (left) at a function held in the city on Saturday.— Photo: S. Siva Saravanan.
title: In recognition
